intro: Rhododendron chilanshanense, commonly known as the Chilanshan rhododendron, is a species native to China, specifically found in the Chilanshan area of Sichuan province. It is a deciduous shrub that typically grows in mountainous regions with high humidity and acidic soils. The plant produces showy, clustered flowers that range in color from pink to red, blooming in the spring.
